thread.title_full: Punjab election results 2017: Watch live coverage on Aaj Tak here

title: Punjab election results 2017: Watch live coverage on Aaj Tak here
text:
Assembly Elections 2017 Punjab election results 2017: Watch live coverage on Aaj Tak here Punjab election results 2017: Be with the Aaj Tak team to get a clearer picture of the post-poll scenario. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Kritika Banerjee A + A - LIVE TV updates 
The results to the 117 Assembly seats in Punjab are almost out and the Congress is set to romp home to victory. 
As Captain Amarinder Singh gets set to sit on the chief minister's chair after a 10-year gap, Aaj Tak's team of experts analyses what will be the challenges for the new government in Punjab. 
WATCH THE LIVE TV COVERAGE 
Several senior journalists are breaking down the news to give you, the viewer, a more clearer picture of what is in store for Punjab and its people. 
The Aaj Tak team has extensively toured the state during the election season and understood what are the issues that matter to the voters. 
Be it employment for youth, putting an end to the drug menace or lending a helping hand to farmers, team Aaj Tak tracked constituencies, trailed key leaders and spoke to voters to give you a picture of the post-poll Punjab. 
Be with the Aaj Tak team to get insights on the election results and beyond. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
